news.title: Gurugram: Illegal farmhouse colonies on DTCP radar, survey underway
news.para: “Along with ongoing drone survey of Aravali forest areas in Gurgaon, DTCP is conducting survey in Gairatpur Bas, Raisina, Kiranki and Bhogpur villages of Sohna tehsil to identify illegal farmhouse colonies,” a senior DTCP official said.

news.title: Bombay HC refuses bail to Deepak Kulkarni of DSK Developers; wife gets relief
news.para: Kulkarni and his wife were arrested on February 17, 2018, for allegedly duping over 32,000 investors to the tune of Rs 2,043 crore by not returning their fixed deposits or paying promised interest.

news.title: Government cuts non-development zone around Thane Creek Flamingo Sanctuary
news.para: This comes as a major relief to builders in the Mumbai Metropolitan Region as hundreds of construction projects would have been affected by the no-development rule.

news.title: Final chance to be given to Unitech buyers seeking refund to reconsider their decision: SC
news.para: ED in its report, filed in a sealed cover before the top court, said that it has attached properties worth Rs 650 crore of Unitech Ltd group in connection with the money laundering charges against it and others, out of which Rs 450 crore is recoverable.

news.title: NGT orders closure of brick kilns violating environmental norms in Mathura
news.para: The NGT noted that brick kilns in Mathura are operative throughout the year without any study of the assimilative air capacity of the area and without following the laid down siting criteria and without consents.

news.title: NGT to conduct audit of Uttar Pradesh-SEIAA to find out frequent blatant violations
news.para: The tribunal was hearing a plea filed by Saviour Park Apartment Owners Association against violation of environmental norms in setting up of a construction project - "Saviour Park" in Ghaziabad by Savfab Buildtech, without valid Environmental Clearance (EC) and without requisite safeguards.

news.title: Indiabulls Real Estate, Embassy Group arms seek NCLT nod for merger
news.para: In February, Indiabulls Real Estate had said that the proposed merger will create one of India's leading listed real estate development platforms, with launched and planned development area of 80.8 million square feet across 30 projects in all the leading cities in India.

news.title: Will stay Kokapet land auction over GO 111 concerns, warns Telangana HC
news.para: The bench took serious note of the state government’s counter stating that if highrise buildings are allowed in over 600 acres of Vattinagulapalli then pollutants and stormwater would pollute Kokapet lake and Himayat Sagar.

news.title: Over 700 guesthouses, hotels in Paharganj, Karol Bagh told to shut over borewell use
news.para: DPCC in its notice has asked the guesthouses to take corrective measures within 15 days, failing which would result in disconnection of electricity and water, along with the cancellation of licence.

news.title: Greater Noida: Illegal ads rampant, recovery certificates issued
news.para: Over the past three-and-a-half years, GNIDA has identified 70 establishments and agencies that put hoardings and unipoles across the town without seeking the authority’s permission or without paying for the advertising rights.

news.title: Yojak raises $3.8 million funding from Info Edge Ventures, others
news.para: Construction-focused global investor, Foundamental and founders of B2B startups such as Zetwerk, MedikaBazaar, Bizongo and Blackbuck, as well as angel investors such as Anupam Mittal, Sanjiv Rangrass also participated in the round.

news.title: Thiruvananthapuram: Slum redevelopment project 'complete' as per lok sabha records
news.para: As per the latest status, the site could not be handed over to the firm due to a slew of issues. The beneficiaries had reportedly asked for enhanced monthly remuneration during the transit period.

news.title: Politicians may be involved in the PMAY scam in Vadodara: Police
news.para: Crime branch sleuths said that one of the accused Pramod Vasava, an executive engineer, had asked software expert Nishith Pithva to alter the list. Both were arrested last week after VMC filed a complaint against them.

news.title: Districts in Karnataka go slow on government's green construction order
news.para: Udupi deputy commissioner KG Jagadeesh said that the district was persisting with the old system of identifying quality material suppliers and carrying out projects through tenders.

news.title: No further construction near Sahastradhara: Uttarakhand high court
news.para: On Monday, the district administration failed to provide specific details regarding the encroachment on the riverbed after which the court asked them to come up with another one on September 23 when the next hearing for the case is to be held.
